article_title: Paul Ryan: A Better Way Up From Poverty
article_text:
In July 2012, our local fairground was full of families, farmers and visitors who had traveled to Janesville, Wis., for the Rock County 4-H Fair. I was shaking hands and talking with people when a man made his way over to me.

"Hey, Paul," he said,...

twitter.description: In The Wall Street Journal, Wisconsin Representative Paul Ryan writes that he's learned he was wrong to talk about 'makers and takers,' and says we have to do more to unwind the cycle of dependency on government.
twitter.title: A Better Way Up From Poverty
